customers_say: Customers find the light switches easy to install, reasonably priced, and functional, with one mentioning they make the house feel more homey. However, the quality receives mixed feedback, with some finding them excellent while others report poor quality. Additionally, customers complain about the noise level, noting that the switches are louder than normal and not quiet at all.AI Generated from the text of customer reviews

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThey withstand 4 kids and wipe off easily.
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: The tactile click has authority which is a good thing for longevity of the contactors. I have four children and these switches and plates are holding up better than the previous Leviton did.

customer_reviews.rating: 5.0 out of 5 stars5.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 27, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Simple switch modernized all of our light switches.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Very nice but I realized that I could have ordered the screw less to look better.

customer_reviews.rating: 4.0 out of 5 stars4.0 out of 5 stars
customer_reviews.review_title: 4.0 out of 5 starsPerfect for my rental
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2025
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I like these a lot came in a smallBox with everything. I had installed immediately perfect for my rental home.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on July 8, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: I’m not electrician just found out about single and triple poles on light switches the single ones work as advertise the triple poles do not work at all. I have to go to all the locations to try to get one to work if you have more than one switch for the same lights do not buy these if this only has one purpose, then buy them.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 9, 2024
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Love the toggle switches. Still replacing the regular switches.

customer_reviews.review_title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Value for the Cost
customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: Works as it should, and I feel this is very reasonably priced.

customer_reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
customer_reviews.review_snippet: If you need just good switches this is them. Would recommend
